body: John M. Falotico, the detective who arrested David R. Berkowitz, the notorious ''Son of Sam'' killer, died on Saturday at his home in North Brunswick, N.J. He was 82. The cause was colon cancer, said his niece, Jennifer Falotico Taylor. Mr. Falotico's date with destiny came around 10 p.m. on Aug. 10, 1977. It had been almost a year since the
title: John Falotico, Detective Who Arrested Berkowitz, Dies at 82
